article.heading: Property Valuation, Equalizing Assessments, Appraisers and Assessment of Property

section.heading: Submission of budget; appointment of assistants; attendance at appraisal schools

content.p: 79-1471. Submission of budget; appointment of assistants; attendance at appraisal schools. The county appraiser shall submit a budget to the board of county commissioners for their approval. The county appraiser shall appoint and dismiss any assistants necessary to carry out the duties of the office. The county appraiser shall supervise all such appointees in the performance of their duties. The county appraiser shall be required to attend and may require others under such appraiser's supervision to attend appraisal schools conducted or prescribed by the director of property valuation.
